name: LG1 Emoji Dodger
description:
WASD controls

Avoid the enemies

R resets if you get hit

E quits the game

Over the next 14 months I intend to make a pile of small games, increasing in scale and complexity each time.  Learning Games, I am calling it the LG series. I'm hoping to have multiple games finished by next demo day, and will show my latest one then.
